column4: does anybody know if the fglrx drivers work with the686 kernel?
does anybody know if the fglrx drivers work with the686 kernel?
it should - see linux-restricted-modules-2.6.10-5-686 - Non-free Linux 2.6.10 modules on PPro/Celeron/PII/PIII/PIV
linux-restricted-modules-2.6.10-5-686 includes the fglrx, nvidia, madwifi driver for the -686 kernel
